summary: P61/P62 Dealer Dashboard V2 testing completed. Backend: 23/23 PASS (100%). Frontend UI: All critical features verified working.
critical_code_review_comments: All backend API contracts verified: GET/POST dashboard, publish, diff, rollback endpoints working correctly
Dashboard guardrails working: KPI없으면 publish disabled (backend 400), 12 초과 widget 추가시 backend 400
Corporate Dashboard admin UI verified: widget palette (KPI/Grafik/Liste/Paket Özeti/Doping Özeti), grid display, Sürükle/Görünür/Kaldır buttons, draft auto-save
Publish modal with diff (added/removed/moved widgets) and confirm checkbox flow working
Individual Header admin UI verified: row-based layout, module library, visible toggle, logo fallback input
Version snapshots and rollback selection working in both dashboard and header designers
Live Render verification card showing source_scope and effective config JSON
seed_data_creation: Multiple test configs created during testing with scope_ids: test-contract-*, test-no-kpi-*, test-too-many-*, test-e2e-*, test-header-*, test-render-*
context_for_next_testing_agent: P61/P62 complete E2E testing done. All backend endpoints pass including extended tests. Frontend UI Designer page at /admin/user-interface-design has 4 tabs: Kurumsal Dashboard V2 (Corporate Dashboard), Kurumsal Header Tasarım, Bireysel Header Tasarım, Tema Yönetimi. Dashboard editor has 12-column grid with widget palette, guardrails enforced (min 1 KPI, max 12 widgets), publish modal with diff display, rollback selection. Individual Header has row-based DnD with module library. All flows working correctly.

individual_header_admin_ui.module_library: PASS (+ Arama, + Hızlı Linkler, + Bildirim, + Kampanya, + Favoriler, + Kullanıcı Menüsü)
